channel.title: Quick Command Question
channel.description: Ok on my server i added the command ::starter for ppl who just start the server, well i made it to where u get 3m when u type ::starter, but i only want it to where it works only once per player, but i can do it multiple times, how do i fix this?

item.title: Quick Command Question
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

declare this in client.java

public int startr =0;

add this to your command

if (command.startsWith("starter") && startr = 0) { startr += 1;

than make another command

if (command.startsWith("starter") && startr = 1) { sM("you already got your starter!"); }

Read full topic
